Text:
Excellent compilation of audio and video civil rights speeches and film footage...
A/10
V/10
Naturally some of the older audio speeches are a bit crackly with age, but all the video content is spot on...
Many many Thanx to litzwires and COINTELPRO for the Excellent rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a steady download...:)

You should look up organized stalking. It is very similar to the FBI's COINTELPRO. There is a very good article about this secret crime here
http://www.raven1.net/
